sentences.english: 27The contoured surface of Jakobshavn Glacier at the fringe of the Greenland ice sheet, on July 19, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 格陵蘭冰原的邊緣，雅各布冰川表面的異樣形狀。

sentences.english: The effects of perforators nose shapes on the perforation are discussed with the calculated results.
sentences.chinese: 基於計算結果，分析了彈頭部形狀對貫穿過程的影響。

sentences.english: So, we find that, in fact, something exists; it has no shape.
sentences.chinese: 我們便會發現，有事物存在，它沒有形狀。

sentences.english: The shape of falling raindrops can be approximately treated as spheroids.
sentences.chinese: 下落雨滴的形狀可以近似地用旋轉橢球體來處理。

sentences.english: Consider the toothbrush’s head shape when selecting your tool of choice.
sentences.chinese: 在選擇牙刷的時候要考慮到刷頭的形狀。

sentences.english: Run the Database Wizard and re-link the shape to correct the problem.
sentences.chinese: 運行“數據庫嚮導”並重新鏈接形狀以更正此問題。

sentences.english: The Congo people decorate their pipes with figural and geometric patterns.
sentences.chinese: 剛果人民用幾和形狀的樣式裝飾他們的菸斗。

sentences.english: Now suppose there are 100 igloos arranged in a rectangular grid.
sentences.chinese: 現在，假設有100座冰屋排成長方格形狀。

sentences.english: Irregular in shape, it is the largest of the Moluccas.
sentences.chinese: 它形狀不規則，是摩鹿加羣島中最大的一個島。

sentences.english: Machine parts of irregular shape can be washed very clean by ultrasonics.
sentences.chinese: 用超聲波能把形狀不規則的機件洗得很乾淨。

sentences.english: The geometry of the sans serif, all-caps typography provided that tie.
sentences.chinese: 幾何形狀的無襯，全帽印刷術提供配合。

sentences.english: This is not the shape of semicircle of nutritious health problems?
sentences.chinese: 沒有這半圓的形狀的人的健康有營養問題嗎？

sentences.english: My chamber pot is in the form & size of a Hubbard squash.
sentences.chinese: 我的尿壺是根據古巴瓜的形狀大小而作。

sentences.english: This master model is a full-scale representation of a part design that incorporates all of the geometry for one of the part surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 原模應以同樣比例大小展現部件表面的形狀設計。

sentences.english: The iron filings were attracted by the magnet and iron to form different shapes.
sentences.chinese: 磁鐵和鐵能吸引鐵粉，形成不同的形狀。

sentences.english: The coil is a wound conductive wire having a cross-section of rectangular-shape.
sentences.chinese: 線圈是通過卷繞截面爲扁平形狀的導線而得到的。

definition: exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
